verses.text_uthmani: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: Successful indeed are the believers:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qad aflaha almu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى صَلَاتِهِمْ خَـٰشِعُونَ

translations.text: those who humble themselves in prayer;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena hum fee salatihimkhashiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنِ ٱللَّغْوِ مُعْرِضُونَ

translations.text: those who avoid idle talk;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum AAani allaghwimuAAridoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِلزَّكَوٰةِ فَـٰعِلُونَ

translations.text: those who pay alms-tax;<sup foot_note=77013>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum lizzakatifaAAiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ

translations.text: those who guard their chastity<sup foot_note=77014>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ

translations.text: except with their wives or those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession,<sup foot_note=77015>1</sup> for then they are free from blame,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa AAala azwajihim awma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru maloomeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ

translations.text: but whoever seeks beyond that are the transgressors;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Famani ibtagha waraa thalikafaola-ika humu alAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ

translations.text: ˹the believers are also˺ those who are true to their trusts and covenants;
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum li-amanatihimwaAAahdihim raAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَوَٰتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ

translations.text: and those who are ˹properly˺ observant of their prayers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum AAala salawatihimyuhafithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ

translations.text: These are the ones who will be awarded
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ola-ika humu alwarithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ

translations.text: Paradise as their own.<sup foot_note=77016>1</sup> They will be there forever.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena yarithoona alfirdawsa humfeeha khalidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍ مِّن طِينٍ

translations.text: And indeed, We created humankind<sup foot_note=77017>1</sup> from an extract of clay,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad khalaqna al-insana minsulalatin min teen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُطْفَةً فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ

translations.text: then placed each ˹human˺ as a sperm-drop<sup foot_note=77018>1</sup> in a secure place,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma jaAAalnahu nutfatan feeqararin makeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ خَلَقْنَا ٱلنُّطْفَةَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْعَلَقَةَ مُضْغَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْمُضْغَةَ عِظَـٰمًا فَكَسَوْنَا ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ لَحْمًا ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ خَلْقًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ

translations.text: then We developed the drop into a clinging clot, then developed the clot into a lump ˹of flesh˺, then developed the lump into bones, then clothed the bones with flesh, then We brought it into being as a new creation.<sup foot_note=77019>1</sup> So Blessed is Allah, the Best of Creators.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma khalaqna annutfataAAalaqatan fakhalaqna alAAalaqata mudghatanfakhalaqna almudghata AAithamanfakasawna alAAithama lahmanthumma ansha/nahu khalqan akhara fatabarakaAllahu ahsanu alkhaliqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ

translations.text: After that you will surely die,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma innakum baAAda thalikalamayyitoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تُبْعَثُونَ

translations.text: then on the Day of Judgment you will be resurrected.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma innakum yawma alqiyamatitubAAathoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلْخَلْقِ غَـٰفِلِينَ

translations.text: And indeed, We created above you seven levels ˹of heaven˺. We are never unmindful of ˹Our˺ creation.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad khalaqna fawqakum sabAAa tara-iqawama kunna AAani alkhalqi ghafileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابٍۭ بِهِۦ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ

translation.text: then We cause it to settle

translations.text: We send down rain from the sky in perfect measure, causing it to soak into the earth. And We are surely able to take it away.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanzalna mina assama-imaan biqadarin faaskannahu fee al-ardiwa-inna AAala thahabin bihi laqadiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَنشَأْنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ لَّكُمْ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ

translations.text: With it We produce for you gardens of palm trees and grapevines, in which there are abundant fruits, and from which you may eat,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faansha/na lakum bihi jannatinmin nakheelin waaAAnabin lakum feeha fawakihukatheeratun waminha ta/kuloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَشَجَرَةً تَخْرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيْنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهْنِ وَصِبْغٍ لِّلْـَٔاكِلِينَ

translations.text: as well as ˹olive˺ trees which grow at Mount Sinai, providing oil and a condiment to eat.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Washajaratan takhruju min toori saynaatanbutu bidduhni wasibghin lilakileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ لَعِبْرَةً ۖ نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ

translations.text: And there is certainly a lesson for you in cattle, from whose bellies We give you ˹milk˺ to drink, and in them are many other benefits for you, and from them you may eat.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lakum fee al-anAAamilaAAibratan nusqeekum mimma fee butoonihawalakum feeha manafiAAu katheeratun waminhata/kuloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَعَلَيْهَا وَعَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ تُحْمَلُونَ

translations.text: And you are carried upon ˹some of˺ them and upon ships.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAalayha waAAala alfulki tuhmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people. He declared, “O my people! Worship Allah ˹alone˺. You have no god other than Him. Will you not then fear ˹Him˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad arsalna noohan ilaqawmihi faqala ya qawmi oAAbudoo Allaha malakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً مَّا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِىٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: But the disbelieving chiefs of his people said ˹to the masses˺, “This is only a human like you, who wants to be superior to you. Had Allah willed, He could have easily sent down angels ˹instead˺. We have never heard of this in ˹the history of˺ our forefathers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqala almalao allatheenakafaroo min qawmihi ma hatha illa basharunmithlukum yureedu an yatafaddala AAalaykum walaw shaaAllahu laanzala mala-ikatan ma samiAAnabihatha fee aba-ina al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

translations.text: He is simply insane, so bear with him for a while.”<sup foot_note=77020>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In huwa illa rajulun bihi jinnatunfatarabbasoo bihi hatta heen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ

translations.text: Noah prayed, “My Lord! Help me, because they have denied ˹me˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi onsurnee bimakaththaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ أَنِ ٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ ۙ فَٱسْلُكْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تُخَـٰطِبْنِى فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّهُم مُّغْرَقُونَ

translations.text: So We inspired him: “Build the Ark under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes and directions. Then when Our command comes and the oven bursts ˹with water˺,<sup foot_note=77021>1</sup> take on board a pair from every species along with your family—except those against whom the decree ˹to drown˺ has already been passed. And do not plead with Me for those who have done wrong, for they will surely be drowned.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faawhayna ilayhi ani isnaAAialfulka bi-aAAyunina wawahyina fa-ithajaa amruna wafara attannooru faslukfeeha min kullin zawjayni ithnayni waahlaka illaman sabaqa AAalayhi alqawlu minhum wala tukhatibneefee allatheena thalamoo innahum mughraqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: Then when you and those with you have settled in the Ark, say, “All praise is for Allah, Who saved us from the wrongdoing people.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-itha istawayta anta waman maAAakaAAala alfulki faquli alhamdu lillahi allatheenajjana mina alqawmi aththalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ

translations.text: And pray, “My Lord! Allow me a blessed landing, for You are the best accommodator.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqul rabbi anzilnee munzalan mubarakanwaanta khayru almunzileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبْتَلِينَ

translations.text: Surely in this are lessons.<sup foot_note=77022>1</sup> And We ˹always˺ put ˹people˺ to the test.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna fee thalika laayatinwa-in kunna lamubtaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ

translations.text: Then We raised another generation after them,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma ansha/na min baAAdihim qarnan akhareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

translations.text: and sent to them a messenger from among themselves, ˹declaring,˺ “Worship Allah ˹alone˺. You have no god other than Him. Will you not then fear ˹Him˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faarsalna feehim rasoolan minhum anioAAbudoo Allaha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhuafala tattaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ مِنْهُ وَيَشْرَبُ مِمَّا تَشْرَبُونَ

translation.text: while We had given them luxury

translations.text: But the chiefs of his people—who disbelieved, denied the meeting ˹with Allah˺ in the Hereafter, and were spoiled by the worldly luxuries We had provided for them—said ˹to the masses˺, “This is only a human like you. He eats what you eat, and drinks what you drink.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqala almalao min qawmihi allatheenakafaroo wakaththaboo biliqa-i al-akhiratiwaatrafnahum fee alhayati addunyama hatha illa basharun mithlukum ya/kulumimma ta/kuloona minhu wayashrabu mimma tashraboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ

translations.text: And if you ˹ever˺ obey a human like yourselves, then you would certainly be losers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala-in ataAAtum basharan mithlakuminnakum ithan lakhasiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ

translations.text: Does he promise you that once you are dead and reduced to dust and bones, you will be brought forth ˹alive˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AyaAAidukum annakum itha mittumwakuntum turaban waAAithaman annakummukhrajoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: Impossible, simply impossible is what you are promised!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hayhata hayhata limatooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ

translations.text: There is nothing beyond our worldly life. We die, others are born, and none will be resurrected.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In hiya illa hayatunaaddunya namootu wanahya wamanahnu bimabAAootheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: He is no more than a man who has fabricated a lie about Allah, and we will never believe in him.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In huwa illa rajulun iftaraAAala Allahi kathiban wama nahnulahu bimu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ

translations.text: The messenger prayed, “My Lord! Help me, because they have denied ˹me˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi onsurnee bimakaththaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَـٰدِمِينَ

translations.text: Allah responded, “Soon they will be truly regretful.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala AAamma qaleelin layusbihunnanadimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءً ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: Then the ˹mighty˺ blast overtook them with justice, and We reduced them to rubble. So away with the wrongdoing people!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faakhathat-humu assayhatubilhaqqi fajaAAalnahum ghuthaanfabuAAdan lilqawmi aththalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ

translations.text: Then We raised other generations after them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma ansha/na min baAAdihimquroonan akhareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ

translations.text: No people can advance their doom, nor can they delay it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma tasbiqu min ommatin ajalahawama yasta/khiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَا ۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةً رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَهُم بَعْضًا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّقَوْمٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: Then We sent Our messengers in succession: whenever a messenger came to his people, they denied him. So We destroyed them, one after the other, reducing them to ˹cautionary˺ tales. So away with the people who refuse to believe!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma arsalna rusulana tatrakulla ma jaa ommatan rasooluha kaththaboohufaatbaAAna baAAdahum baAAdan wajaAAalnahumahadeetha fabuAAdan liqawmin la yu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs<sup foot_note=77023>1</sup> and compelling proof
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma arsalna moosa waakhahuharoona bi-ayatina wasultaninmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَالِينَ

translations.text: to Pharaoh and his chiefs, but they behaved arrogantly and were a tyrannical people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ila firAAawna wamala-ihi fastakbaroowakanoo qawman AAaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَـٰبِدُونَ

translations.text: They argued, “Will we believe in two humans, like ourselves, whose people are slaves to us?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqaloo anu/minu libasharayni mithlinawaqawmuhuma lana AAabidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ

translations.text: So they rejected them both, and ˹so˺ were among those destroyed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakaththaboohuma fakanoomina almuhlakeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so perhaps his people would be ˹rightly˺ guided.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad atayna moosaalkitaba laAAallahum yahtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةً وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبْوَةٍ ذَاتِ قَرَارٍ وَمَعِينٍ

translations.text: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign, and gave them refuge on high ground—a ˹suitable˺ place for rest with flowing water.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalna ibna maryama waommahu ayatanwaawaynahuma ila rabwatin thatiqararin wamaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ

translations.text: O messengers! Eat from what is good and lawful, and act righteously. Indeed, I fully know what you do.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya ayyuha arrusulukuloo mina attayyibati waAAmaloo salihaninnee bima taAAmaloona AAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُونِ

translations.text: Surely this religion of yours is ˹only˺ one, and I am your Lord, so fear Me ˹alone˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatanwaana rabbukum fattaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ زُبُرًا ۖ كُلُّ حِزْبٍۭ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِحُونَ

translations.text: Yet the people have divided it into different sects, each rejoicing in what they have.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FataqattaAAoo amrahum baynahumzuburan kullu hizbin bima ladayhim farihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

translations.text: So leave them ˹O Prophet˺ in their heedlessness for a while.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatharhum fee ghamratihim hattaheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍ وَبَنِينَ

translations.text: Do they think, since We provide them with wealth and children,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ayahsaboona annama numidduhumbihi min malin wabaneen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ

translations.text: that We hasten to ˹honour˺ them ˹with˺ all kinds of good? No! They are not aware.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: NusariAAu lahum fee alkhayratibal la yashAAuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ

translations.text: Surely those who tremble in awe of their Lord,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena hum min khashyatirabbihim mushfiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: and who believe in the revelations of their Lord,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum bi-ayatirabbihim yu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِكُونَ

translations.text: and who associate none with their Lord,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena hum birabbihim layushrikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَوا۟ وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ رَٰجِعُونَ

translations.text: and who do whatever ˹good˺ they do with their hearts fearful, ˹knowing˺ that they will return to their Lord<sup foot_note=77024>1</sup>—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena yu/toona maataw waquloobuhum wajilatun annahum ila rabbihim rajiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَـٰبِقُونَ

translations.text: it is they who race to do good deeds, always taking the lead.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ola-ika yusariAAoona feealkhayrati wahum laha sabiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۖ وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَـٰبٌ يَنطِقُ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ

translations.text: We never require of any soul more than what it can afford. And with Us is a record which speaks the truth. None will be wronged.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala nukallifu nafsan illawusAAaha waladayna kitabun yantiqu bilhaqqiwahum la yuthlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلٌ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَـٰمِلُونَ

translations.text: But the hearts of those ˹who disbelieve˺ are oblivious to ˹all of˺ this,<sup foot_note=77025>1</sup> and they have other ˹evil˺ deeds, opposite to this, in which they are engrossed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratin min hathawalahum aAAmalun min dooni thalika hum lahaAAamiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيهِم بِٱلْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَجْـَٔرُونَ

translations.text: But as soon as We seize their elite with torment, they start to cry for help.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha akhathnamutrafeehim bilAAathabi itha hum yaj-aroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

translations.text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Do not cry for help today. Surely you will never be saved from Us.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La taj-aroo alyawma innakum minnala tunsaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, My revelations were recited to you, but you used to back away ˹in disgust˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qad kanat ayatee tutlaAAalaykum fakuntum AAala aAAqabikum tankisoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَـٰمِرًا تَهْجُرُونَ

translations.text: boasting of the Sacred House, and babbling ˹nonsense about the Quran˺ by night.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Mustakbireena bihi samiran tahjuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ ٱلْقَوْلَ أَمْ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: Is it because they have never contemplated the Word ˹of Allah˺? Or ˹because˺ there has come to them something that did not come to their forefathers?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afalam yaddabbaroo alqawla am jaahumma lam ya/ti abaahumu al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

translations.text: Or ˹because˺ they failed to recognize their Messenger, and so they denied him?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lam yaAArifoo rasoolahum fahum lahumunkiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۚ بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ

translations.text: Or ˹because˺ they say, “He is insane?” In fact, he has come to them with the truth, but most of them are resentful of the truth.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am yaqooloona bihi jinnatun bal jaahumbilhaqqi waaktharuhum lilhaqqi karihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ

translations.text: Had the truth followed their desires,<sup foot_note=77026>1</sup> the heavens, the earth, and all those in them would have certainly been corrupted. In fact, We have brought them ˹the means to˺ their glory, but they turn away from it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walawi ittabaAAa alhaqqu ahwaahumlafasadati assamawatu wal-arduwaman feehinna bal ataynahum bithikrihim fahum AAanthikrihim muAAridoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ

translations.text: Or ˹is it because˺ you ˹O Prophet˺ are asking them for tribute? But the reward of your Lord is best, for He is the Best Provider.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am tas-aluhum kharjan fakharajurabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru arraziqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

translations.text: And surely you are calling them to the Straight Path,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innaka latadAAoohum ila siratinmustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَـٰكِبُونَ

translations.text: but those who disbelieve in the Hereafter are certainly deviating from that Path.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna allatheena layu/minoona bil-akhirati AAani assiratilanakiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ

translations.text: ˹Even˺ if We had mercy on them and removed their affliction,<sup foot_note=77027>1</sup> they would still persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw rahimnahum wakashafnama bihim min durrin lalajjoo fee tughyanihimyaAAmahoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ

translations.text: And We have already seized them with torment, but they never humbled themselves to their Lord, nor did they ˹submissively˺ appeal ˹to Him˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad akhathnahum bilAAathabifama istakanoo lirabbihim wama yatadarraAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا ذَا عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ

translations.text: But as soon as We open for them a gate of severe punishment, they will be utterly desperate.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha fatahnaAAalayhim baban tha AAathabin shadeedin ithahum feehi mublisoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ

translations.text: He is the One Who created for you hearing, sight, and intellect. ˹Yet˺ you hardly give any thanks.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee anshaa lakumu assamAAawal-absara wal-af-idata qaleelan matashkuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ

translations.text: And He is the One Who has dispersed you ˹all˺ over the earth, and to Him you will ˹all˺ be gathered.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee tharaakum feeal-ardi wa-ilayhi tuhsharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ

translations.text: And He is the One Who gives life and causes death, and to Him belongs the alternation of the day and night. Will you not then understand?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee yuhyeewayumeetu walahu ikhtilafu allayli wannahariafala taAAqiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ

translations.text: But they ˹just˺ say what their predecessors said.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal qaloo mithla ma qalaal-awwaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ

translations.text: They said, “Once we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo a-itha mitnawakunna turaban waAAithamana-inna lamabAAoothoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: We have already been promised this, as well as our forefathers earlier. This is nothing but ancient fables!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad wuAAidna nahnu waabaonahatha min qablu in hatha illa asateerual-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “To whom belong the earth and all those on it, if you ˹really˺ know?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul limani al-ardu waman feehain kuntum taAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.text: They will reply, “To Allah!” Say, “Why are you not then mindful?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afalatathakkaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.text: ˹And˺ ask ˹them˺, “Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the Mighty Throne?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul man rabbu assamawatiassabAAi warabbu alAAarshi alAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

translations.text: They will reply, “Allah.” Say, “Will you not then fear ˹Him˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afalatattaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: Ask ˹them also,˺ “In Whose Hands is the authority over all things, protecting ˹all˺ while none can protect against Him, if you ˹really˺ know?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul man biyadihi malakootu kulli shay-inwahuwa yujeeru wala yujaru AAalayhi in kuntumtaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسْحَرُونَ

translations.text: They will reply, “Allah.” Say, “How are you then so deluded?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul faannatusharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ

translations.text: In fact, We have brought them the truth, and they are certainly liars.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal ataynahum bilhaqqiwa-innahum lakathiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ إِذًا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

translations.text: Allah has never had ˹any˺ offspring, nor is there any god besides Him. Otherwise, each god would have taken away what he created, and they would have tried to dominate one another. Glorified is Allah above what they claim!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma ittakhatha Allahumin waladin wama kana maAAahu min ilahin ithanlathahaba kullu ilahin bima khalaqa walaAAalabaAAduhum AAala baAAdin subhana AllahiAAamma yasifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

translations.text: ˹He is the˺ Knower of the seen and unseen. Exalted is He above what they associate ˹with Him˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAalimi alghaybi washshahadatifataAAala AAamma yushrikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “My Lord! Should You show me what they<sup foot_note=77028>1</sup> are threatened with,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul rabbi imma turiyannee mayooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: then, my Lord, do not count me among the wrongdoing people.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbi fala tajAAalnee fee alqawmi aththalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ

translations.text: We are indeed able to show you what We have threatened them with.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna AAala an nuriyaka manaAAiduhum laqadiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ

translations.text: Respond to evil with what is best. We know well what they claim.<sup foot_note=77029>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: IdfaAA billatee hiya ahsanu assayyi-atanahnu aAAlamu bima yasifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ

translations.text: And say, “My Lord! I seek refuge in You from the temptations of the devils.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqul rabbi aAAoothu bika min hamazatiashshayateen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ

translations.text: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, that they ˹even˺ come near me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaaAAoothu bika rabbi an yahduroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرْجِعُونِ

translations.text: When death approaches any of them, they cry, “My Lord! Let me go back,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha jaa ahadahumualmawtu qala rabbi irjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَعَلِّىٓ أَعْمَلُ صَـٰلِحًا فِيمَا تَرَكْتُ ۚ كَلَّآ ۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَا ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

translations.text: so I may do good in what I left behind.” Never! It is only a ˹useless˺ appeal they make. And there is a barrier behind them until the Day they are resurrected.<sup foot_note=77030>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: LaAAallee aAAmalu salihanfeema taraktu kalla innaha kalimatun huwa qa-iluhawamin wara-ihim barzakhun ila yawmi yubAAathoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

translations.text: Then, when the Trumpet will be blown,<sup foot_note=77031>1</sup> there will be no kinship between them on that Day, nor will they ˹even care to˺ ask about one another.<sup foot_note=77032>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-itha nufikha fee assoorifala ansaba baynahum yawma-ithin walayatasaaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ

translations.text: As for those whose scale is heavy ˹with good deeds˺, it is they who will be successful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faman thaqulat mawazeenuhu faola-ikahumu almuflihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ

translations.text: But those whose scale is light, they will have doomed themselves, staying in Hell forever.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman khaffat mawazeenuhu faola-ikaallatheena khasiroo anfusahum fee jahannama khalidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَـٰلِحُونَ

translations.text: The Fire will burn their faces, leaving them deformed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Talfahu wujoohahumu annaruwahum feeha kalihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.text: ˹It will be said,˺ “Were My revelations not recited to you, but you used to deny them?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam takun ayatee tutlaAAalaykum fakuntum biha tukaththiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَآلِّينَ

translations.text: They will cry, “Our Lord! Our ill-fate took hold of us, so we became a misguided people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo rabbana ghalabatAAalayna shiqwatuna wakunna qawman dalleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ

translations.text: Our Lord! Take us out of this ˹Fire˺. Then if we ever return ˹to denial˺, we will truly be wrongdoers.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbana akhrijna minhafa-in AAudna fa-inna thalimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ

translations.text: Allah will respond, “Be despised in there! Do not ˹ever˺ plead with Me ˹again˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ikhsaoo feeha walatukallimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

translations.text: Indeed, there was a group of My servants who used to pray, ‘Our Lord! We have believed, so forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the best of those who show mercy,’
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu kana fareequn min AAibadeeyaqooloona rabbana amanna faghfirlana warhamna waanta khayru arrahimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ

translations.text: but you were ˹so busy˺ making fun of them that it made you forget My remembrance. And you used to laugh at them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fattakhathtumoohumsikhriyyan hatta ansawkum thikree wakuntumminhum tadhakoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ

translations.text: Today I have indeed rewarded them for their perseverance: they are certainly the triumphant.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innee jazaytuhumu alyawma bima sabarooannahum humu alfa-izoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

translations.text: He will ask ˹them˺, “How many years did you remain on earth?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala kam labithtum fee al-ardiAAadada sineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ

translations.text: They will reply, “We remained ˹only˺ a day or part of a day.<sup foot_note=77033>1</sup> But ask those who kept count.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo labithna yawman aw baAAdayawmin fas-ali alAAaddeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: He will say, “You only remained for a little while, if only you knew.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala in labithtum illaqaleelan law annakum kuntum taAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ

translations.text: Did you then think that We had created you without purpose, and that you would never be returned to Us?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afahasibtum annama khalaqnakumAAabathan waannakum ilayna la turjaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ

translations.text: Exalted is Allah, the True King! There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him, the Lord of the Honourable Throne.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FataAAala Allahualmaliku alhaqqu la ilaha illa huwarabbu alAAarshi alkareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ

translations.text: Whoever invokes, besides Allah, another god—for which they can have no proof—they will surely find their penalty with their Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will never succeed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman yadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara la burhana lahu bihi fa-innamahisabuhu AAinda rabbihi innahu la yuflihualkafiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “My Lord! Forgive and have mercy, for You are the best of those who show mercy.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqul rabbi ighfir warhamwaanta khayru arrahimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
